item.title: Gallery with image processing
item.description: Demo with images from pixabay.com using shortcode: {{< res-gallery match="**/pixabay.com/*" caption-position="bottom" caption-effect="fade" hover-effect="slideup" >}} pixabay.comCC0 1.0 pixabay.comCC0 1.0 pixabay.comCC0 1.0 pixabay.comCC0 1.0 pixabay.

item.title: Attachments
item.description: Add page resources of type application as attachments to a page via the res-attach shortcode.

item.title: Image Processing (`res-figure`)
item.description: Image page resources can be resized and cropped. This only works for images which are page resources, not for images in the /static folder. This theme provides a shortcode res-figure for page resource image processing.
